title: Hydrogen production without CO2 is getting a boost with new tech from Verdagy - TechCrunch
content: Hydrogen production without CO2 is getting a boost with new tech from Verdagy  TechCrunch
description: Hydrogen pioneers Verdagy — from “verde” for green, and “agy” for energy — raised $25 million from a fistful of strategic investors in the energy sector in a bid to take a messy, not-that-environmentally-friendly process of making hydrogen and replacing it with a…
